tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE encryption_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(255),
    activity_description TEXT,
    activity_date DATE,
    event_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES quantum_encryption_events(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE quantum_encryption_events (
 event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 event_description TEXT,
 event_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE encryption_activities (
 activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 activity_name VARCHAR(255),
 activity_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE encryption_participants (
 participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 participant_name VARCHAR(255),
 participant_role VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE quantum_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_date DATE,
    event_type VARCHAR(50)
)
